task.title: Pick up A Group Member's Call by BLF
task.shortdesc: You can set a BLF key for Group Call Pickup on your IP phone. When your group member's phone is ringing, you can press the BLF key to quickly pick up the call.

context.p: We take Yealink T27G v69.82.0.20 as an example below.

step.cmd: Log in the phone web interface, go to Dsskey page.
Set the BLF key as below.

ul.li: Value: Enter the feature code of group pickup. The default code is *4.
Label: Set a label that you want to display on the phone screen.
Line: Choose the line where your extension is registered on.

step.stepresult: If your configuration is correct, the BLF LED will turn green.
